title: Why Amazon won’t foot the bill to pay Twitch streamers better
description: "Why not just give 70/30 to everybody[?] We absolutely looked at all options to do that," said Twitch's VP of monetization. "Those options were not viable for us[.]"

title: Amazon to launch first of its Kuiper Internet satellites on ULA rocket
description: Two prototypes would launch early next year as Amazon seeks to build a constellation that will compete with SpaceX’s Starlink system.

title: Violent threats against Jan. 6 witnesses spread on fringe sites
description: As the Jan. 6 committee studies the role social media played in the insurrection, threats to kill or injure key witnesses fester on 4chan and the .win forums.

title: Musk appeasement of Putin and China stokes fears of changed Twitter policies
description: In one week, Elon Musk letting Russia keep territory in Ukraine, suggested China take control of Taiwan, and welcomed a widely followed celebrity back to Twitter who had just had his Instagram account suspended for threatening Jews.

title: The next U.S. battle tank could use AI to identify targets
description: The AbramsX is the largest redesign of U.S. military tanks since the Cold War, but its approval faces an uphill climb in the Pentagon

title: Tour Amazon’s dream home, where every appliance is also a spy
description: A visual guide to what Amazon learns about you through Alexa, Echo speakers, Fire TVs, Ring doorbells, Roombas and more.
